<title level="1" pfs="">[Halspin the Stung](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1504)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 44

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Halspin the Stung](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1504)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 40</row>

**Perception** +24; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Amurrun](/Languages.aspx?ID=25), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +28, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +24, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +25, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [corrosive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ with 20 arrows, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_, _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, [morin khurr](/Equipment.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +28 

**Will** +26 

</row>

**HP** 250

**Cat's Luck** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** Halspin fails or critically fails a Reflex saving throw; **Effect** Halspin rerolls the save and takes the better result.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_claw_ +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +30 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 piercing plus 1d6 acid

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 34
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Cloak of Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=41), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273), [Shadow Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=274) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353) (3 slots)
- **7th**
[Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), [Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=100), [Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233) (3 slots)
- **8th**
[Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267), [Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347) (2 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells** DC 34, 3 Focus Points
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Allegro](/Spells.aspx?ID=380), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **8th**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381), [Inspire Heroics](/Spells.aspx?ID=388), [Soothing Ballad](/Spells.aspx?ID=391)

</column>
name: Halspin the Stung
